GSP28jsbh2-4u:4: “yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajete” tyatra kāmye eva svargādyarthe darśapūrṇamāsakarmaṇi jīvanaparyāptakālavidhiḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:9: ato dhātusaṃbandhādhikāravihitaṇamulpratyayena jīvanasya karmasaṃbandhāvagateḥ svāvacchinnakālakatvādirūpasaṃbandhāśrayaṇe ca guṇabhūtakālānurodhena pradhānāvṛtternyāyalabhyatvābhāvena yāvacchabdārthasyāpi vidheyatvāpatterlāghavānnimittatvameva saṃbandhaḥ pratīyate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:13: yathā rāhūparāgānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi avaśyānuṣṭhānaṃ yasya snānasya tadvattvaṃ rāhūparāge
GSP28jsbh2-4u:17: karaṇe ca 'dharmeṇa pāpamapanudati' ityādivākyaśeṣāt rātrisatranyāyena pāpakṣaya evānuṣaṅgiko nityanaimittikasthale phalam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:18: yatratu rathantarasāmatvādinimittasattve naimittikasya pāṭhādeva prāptisaṃbhavenānvayānuvidhānasya pramāṇāntareṇa prāptistatra vyatirekānuvidhāna eva vidhestātparyam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:20: ataśca yāvajjīvapade lāghavādyanurodhena jīvanasya nimittatvāvagatestadanurodhena pāpakṣayārthaṃ viniyogāntaramevedamiti siddham // 1 // iti prathamaṃ yāvajjīvanimittatādhikaraṇam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:21: (yāvajjīvaguṇasaṃyuktāgnihotrādiprayogabhedābhedacintā vārtikakārāṇāṃ saṃmateti nirūpaṇam) darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti kāmyaprayogaṃ vidhāya bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe āmnātaṃ vākyamudāharati ---------- yāvajjīvamiti
GSP28jsbh2-4u:23: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa sūtrānuguṇyena karmadharmatvakartṛdharmatvacintāṃ kṛtāmapi tṛtīyādhyāyasaṃgatāyāstasyā bhedalakṣaṇe 'paryavasite sati karaṇe lakṣaṇāsaṅgatyāpatterayuktāmapi kiṃ yāvajjīvaguṇasaṃyuktānāmagnihotrādīnāṃ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:24: prayogā bhidyante; uta eka evāyaṃ prayogaḥ kāmyaḥ sa eva yāvajjīva kālaparimita ityevaṃ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:27: nirūpaṇam) vastutastu ---------- prayogāṅgasyāpi yāvajjīvakālasya pūrvaprayoge sāyaṃprātaḥkālāvaruddhe 'varodhasaṃbhavānna yathā pūrvapakṣe prayogabhedakatvam, tathā nimittasyāpi pūrvaprayoge 'saṃbhavato 'pi
GSP28jsbh2-4u:28: prayogānaṅgatvāt tattatpaurṇamāsyādikālīnasiddhaprayogasya karmaṇo viniyogāntarāpādakatve 'pi prayogāntarānāpādakatvānna kālādivat prayogabhedakatvamiti prayogabhedābhedacintāyā asaṃbhavāt
GSP28jsbh2-4u:30: viniyogānvayitvena tatprayuktaviniyogabhedābhedasya kvāpi pūrvamaprakṛtasyeha pādārthatvena kaustubhe uktāṃ lakṣaṇasaṅgatiṃ tathā nimittasya guṇatvena bhedakatvepyanupādeyaprasaṅgānnimittasvarūpānupādeyasya viniyogabhedakatvavicāreṇa prāsaṅgikīmanantarasaṅgatiṃ ca spaṣṭatvāt,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:32: (kāmye darśapūrṇamāsakarmaṇi guṇavidhānamiti pūrvapakṣopapādanam) uta eka evāyaṃ prayogaḥ kāmyaḥ sa eva yāvajjīvakālaparimita iti vārtikalekhanāt kāmyaprayoge 'yaṃ kālavidhiriti bhramaṃ nivartayituṃ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:34: (kāmya evetyevakāreṇa siddhānte prakaraṇānanugrahasya pūrvapakṣe tadanugrahasya ca sūcanam) tataścaitadvākye prayogānvayiguṇābhāvena prayogavidheḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:35: siddhānte 'pyanāśrayaṇāt paurṇamāsyādikālavidhauca tadāśrayaṇe vinigamanāvirahāt atrāpi tadāpatterihaiva karmoddeśena kālavidhāne sati
GSP28jsbh2-4u:39: kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣālakṣaṇaprakaraṇānanugrahaṃ pūrvapakṣe tadanugrahañca sūcayituṃ kāmya evetyevakāraḥ prayuktaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:40: (yāvajjīvapadasya ṇamulantatvaṃ na nimittatvena kintu kālavidhitveneti nirūpaṇam) kālavidhiriti
GSP28jsbh2-4u:41: yāvajjīvapadasya ṇamulantasyāpi yāvaddehaṃ tiṣṭhatītivat nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā kālaparatvopapatteḥ abhikrāmaṃ juhotītyatra ṇamulantasyāpi nimittaparatvādarśanādiha kālavidhireva yukta ityarthaḥ aparāhṇādivaditi //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:44: (atra pūrvapakṣe prācīnāpāditayajatyabhyāsalakṣaṇānirāsaḥ) atra prācīnaiḥ siddhānte paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayordarśapūrṇamāsānuṣṭhānena jīvanaparyāptakālānugrahāsaṃbhavāt yāgābhyāsavidhānāya yajatāvabhyāsalakṣaṇā pūrvapakṣe āpāditā, tāṃ parihartumāha ----------
GSP28jsbh2-4u:46: evañca nābhyāsalakṣaṇā natarāñca tasya vidheyatvamityevakāreṇa sūcitam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:48: (vyāpyaprayogātiriktavyāpakaprayogāntaravidhipakṣeṇopapādanam) evañca yathaiva paurṇamāsyādivākyeṣu kālaviśiṣṭavyāpyaprayogavidhiḥ, tathaiva yāvajjīvavākye 'pi kālaviśiṣṭaprayogasya vidhānaṃ nānupapannam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:49: ataeva vidheyatāvacchedakatayā jīvanaparyāpteṣu tāvatsu vyāpyaprayogeṣu tattadvidheyatāvacchedakatayā vibhinnadharmāntareṣvapi vyāsaktaikadharmasya svīkārādvyāpyaprayogavyāsaktavyāpakaprayogādeva phalamityāha ---------- svargādīti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:50: vyāpyavyāpakaprayogaviśiṣṭakarmaṇaḥ phalāpekṣāyāṃ svargakāmādivākyena svargārthatayaiva viniyogāt svargādyeva phalam, natu yāvajjīvavākyena pāpakṣayārthatvena viniyogāt pāpakṣayaḥ pṛthak phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:51: evañca jīvanaparyāptaistāvadbhiḥ prayogaiḥ ekameva phalaṃ svargādi
GSP28jsbh2-4u:54: (ante eva svargādi nāntarā, nāpi pāpakṣaya ityādinirūpaṇam) vastutastu
GSP28jsbh2-4u:55: ----------- vyāpakaprayogeṇaiva nirvāhe tattadvyāpyaprayogasvīkāre naiva kiñcit pramāṇam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:56: naca vinigamanāvirahaḥ; paurṇamāsyādivākyeṣu vyāpakaprayogānuvādena tattatkālavidhāne 'pi jīvanakālāvacchedakatvavidhayā tattatkālaniveśasaṃbhavasyaiva niyāmakatvāt /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:60: ataeva prayogabhedābhāvena prakṛtasaṅgatyasaṃbhavena viniyogabhedamādāya saṅgatyupapādanaṃ kaustubhoktaṃ saṃgacchate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:61: tāvatāpica paurṇamāsyādikālāvacchinnajīvanaparyāptakālikaprayogādeva phalaṃ svargādi nāntarā navā pāpakṣayaḥ phalamityasya phalabhedasya na kṣatiriti dhyeyam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:62: (yāvacchabdārthasya puruṣadharmatvena kālavidhānāyogena nyāyalabdhāvṛttyanuvādatvakathanam) yāvajjīvaśabde hi yāvacchabdasya
GSP28jsbh2-4u:63: sāmastyavacanatvāt tasya śakyārthasya puruṣadharmatvena karmadharmatvāyogāt avaśyaṃ jīvapade jīvanakālalakṣaṇāmeva pūrvapakṣe lakṣaṇāpattirityanenābhipretyābhyāsalakṣaṇāpattiṃ prācīnoktāmapahāya kālalakṣaṇameva pūrvapakṣe āpādayan siddhāntamāha---------
GSP28jsbh2-4u:66: taddhātvarthasya dhātvarthāntareṇa saṃbandhasya ṇamulābhidhānāt saṃbandhaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yāvacchabdatātparyagrāhakavaśāt nimittatvarūpatadviśeṣapratīterna tatpratipādanāya manmate lakṣaṇāpattirityabhipretyāha ----------- ata iti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:67: saṃbandhavidhayaiva kālabodhopapattermamāpi na lakṣaṇāpattiriti pūrvapakṣiṇo lakṣaṇāparihārāśayaḥ saṃbandhāśrayaṇe cetyanena sūcitaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:68: yāvacchabdārthasya vidheyatve ekapadopādānāt viśiṣṭaprayogavidhānādvā vākyabhedānāpattāvapi gauravāpattirlāghavādityanena sūcitā /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:70: padārthavidhayā bhāne lakṣaṇācetyubhayaṃ nimittatvamevetyevakāreṇa vyāvartyaṃ sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:72: prāṇakriyārūpāṇāṃ jīvanānāṃ bhedānnimittāvṛttyupapatteḥ jīvanagatasāmastyasya naimittikasaṃbandhitvena prāptatvādanuvāda ityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:75: yatratu vartamānāpadeśena tacchravaṇam yathā yāvaddohamityatra tatrānuṣṭhānasyaivābodhanena nānuṣṭhāpakatvarūpatadapekṣayā dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhaḥ, kintu svāvacchinnakālakatvameva sa iti vaiṣamyam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:79: yaditvihāpi yāvaddohaḥ svapyādāsītaveti vidhīyeta, tataḥ kena vā dohasya nimittatvaṃ vāryate” iti /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:80: ato jīvanasya nimittatvāt nimittasyānuṣṭhāpakatve 'pi prayogākṣepakatve pramāṇābhāvāt svataḥsiddhaprayogānāmevaiṣāṃ nimittasaṃbandhena vividiṣāyāmiva viniyogāntaramevedamiti na vyāpakaprayogānta eva svargādi phalam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:81: paurṇamāsīpaurvāhṇādikālaśāstrāntaraikavākyatayāca paurvāhṇikakālāvacchinnapaurṇamāsyavacchinna jīvanasya nimittatvānna tithyantarasya jīvane nimittatvasya na vaikasyāmeva paurṇamāsyāṃ tadavacchinnajīvanarūpanimittabhedādāvṛttyāpattervā prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:82: paurvāhṇikakālāvacchinnapaurṇamāsyāmeva pratikṣaṇañjīvanabhedamādāyāvṛttyāpādanaṃ tvaśakyatvādeva na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:86: (nimittasamabhivyāhṛtavidherakaraṇe pratyavāyabodhakatvam) niyatatvasyaca buddhipūrvakāriṇā puruṣeṇa svato 'saṃpādyamānatvāt nimittasamabhivyāhṛto vidhiḥ yogyatābalena vidheyākaraṇasya pratyavāyasādhanatāṃ bodhayatītyabhipretyāha ---------- ataśceti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:91: nyāyasudhākṛtā tu pratyayavācyabhāvanāyā bhāvyasākāṅkṣatvaniyamāt karaṇātphalāṅgīkārepyakaraṇanimittapratyavāyaprāgabhāvaparipālanasya phalatvamityuktam, tadubhayanirāsāyāha --------- karaṇe ceti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:92: kāmyamānena svargādiphalenāvaśyakatvānirvāhāt viśvajinnyāyena svargaphalakalpanāyogāt phalaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ “dharmeṇa pāpamapanudati,”
GSP28jsbh2-4u:93: “pūrvāṃ sandhyāṃ japan vipro naiśameno vyapohati,” “yadrātryā pāpamakārṣaṃ yadahnā pāpamakārṣaṃ manasā vācā hastābhyāṃ” ityādivākyaśeṣebhyo niṣiddhācaraṇajanyapratyavāyakṣayasya phalatvamavasīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:94: yadyapi dharmeṇetyasya na kiñcidvākyaśeṣatvam, apitu vākyatvameva; tathāpi ādipadasaṃgṛhītānāṃ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:96: akaraṇe pratyavāyabhiyā pravṛttasya pāpakṣayārthaṃ pravṛttyabhāvamapekṣya pāpakṣayasyānuṣaṅgikatvoktiḥ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:100: (pūrvottarakalpaprayojananirūpaṇam) prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe yāvajjīvamabhyastarūpaka ekaḥ kāmya eva proyagaḥ jīvanakālasya vikṛtau sauryādāvatideśādyāvajjīviko 'bhyāsaḥ, siddhānte tvaphalakāmasyāpi sāyaṃprātaḥkālayorabhyastarūpastatraivaca parisamāpta ekaḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:101: sāyaṃprātaḥkālāntare tathaivāparaḥ sauryeca nimittasyānatideśānna yāvajjīvaṃ prayoga iti spaṣṭatvānnoktam
GSP28jsbh2-4u:113: ata eva vedabhede puruṣābhedādekatraivotpattiraparatra guṇārthaṃ śravaṇabhityatra niyāmakaṃ vakṣyate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:114: vedaikatve tu pratiśākhaṃ puruṣabhedāt satyapi sarveṣāmutpattiparatve na karmabhedaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:115: ata evaikasmin karmaṇi viruddhānāṃ nānāśākhāgatāṅgānāṃ vikalpaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:120: yattu 'bahnalpaṃ vā svagṛhyoktaṃ' ityādivacanantat sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsaṃbhave 'nukalpavidhānārthamiti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:122: ataḥ paraṃ teṣāṃ viniyogo nirūpayiṣyate // 2 // iti dvitīyaṃ śākhāntarādhikaraṇam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:123: iti śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:126: pūrvamutpattiprayogaviniyogabhedakatvenoktānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pramāṇānāṃ nirūpaṇe kṛte saṃpratyekavedagatanānāśākhāgatakarmavidhiṣu śabdāntarasaṃjñāsaṃkhyānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ bhedakatvāyoge 'pi
GSP28jsbh2-4u:128: tathānantarādhikaraṇopanyastaviniyogabhedakatvasyāpya- pavādādāpavādikīṃ cānantarasaṅgatiṃ spaṣṭatvāttathā pūrvapakṣaṃ cātiphalgutvādanuktvodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ siddhāntamevāha ----------
GSP28jsbh2-4u:134: ato yatrobhayatra rūpalābhenotpattividhibhedasaṃbhavaḥ, tatraiva bhedaśaṅkotthānāt teṣāmevodāharaṇatvamityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:136: (saṃjñāśabdāntasaṅkhyānāmabhedakatvepi abhyāsaguṇādeḥ bhedakatvasaṃbhavena pūrvapakṣaḥ) yadapi kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakamityādisaṃjñāyāḥ karmabhedakatvaṃ sūtrakāreṇoktam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:139: tathā śabdāntarasyāpi samānadhātvarthakatvāt itaradhātvarthāpekṣayā bhedakatvasya siddhānte 'pīṣṭatvānnabhedakatvam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:142: dūrasthatvenāsannidherupādeya- guṇasāmānyābhāvācca prakaraṇāntarasyaca bhedakatvasaṃbhavābhiprāyeṇa bhedakapramāṇeṣviti bahuvacanopādānaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:147: vṛṇīte ityatra satyapyadhvaryoruddeśyatve vṛtenādhvaryuṇā svakāryaṃ kuryāditi kalpyavidhāvupādeyatayā śravaṇādekatvavivakṣā, tathehāpyadhītena svādhyāyenārthajñānaṃ bhāvayediti kalpyaviniyogavidhau upādeyatvaśravaṇāt tadvivakṣeti nirāsaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:150: “anayā trayyā vidyayā lokaṃ jayati” “vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi
GSP28jsbh2-4u:151: yathākrama” mityādiśrutismṛtibhirvedāntaragataśākhādhyayanasyābhyanujñānāt tadanurodhenādhyāyapadamapi ṛgvedatvādivyāpyaśākhā- parameva; tatraivaca svīyatvaikatvayorviśeṣaṇatvāt /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:152: ṛgvedatvādivyāpyāyā ekaikapitryādiparamparāgatāyāḥ śākhāyā adhyayananiyamakaraṇena tadvyāpyaśākhāntarasyaivādhyayanavidhāne 'pi na vedāntaragatāyāstannivṛttirityabhipretya samādhatte---------- vedāniti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:154: vedabhedena tadadhyayanasya sarvapuruṣān pratyavirodhāt tadgatavidhipunaḥ śravaṇasyādhyetṛbhedapuraskāreṇa jñānārthatvena parihārāsaṃbhavāt ubhayotpattau prāptāyāṃ bhūyodharmāmnānaṃ yatra tatrotpattiritaratra guṇārthaṃ śravaṇamityarthabhūyastvaṃ niyāmakaṃ tṛtīye vakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:155: evaṃ yatra sāmavede ekasyāmeva śākhāyāṃ pañcaviṃśaṣaṅviṃśākhyabrāhmaṇabhedastatrāpyadhyetṛbhedābhāvādekatra vidhiraparatrānuvādo bādhakāsattve, tadabhāvetu karmāntaramevābhyāsādityapi jñeyam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:157: tattadadhyetṝn prati ajñātotpattijñāpakatayā vidhipunaḥśravaṇopapatterna karmabheda ityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:158: evaṃ vidhipunaḥ śravaṇasyānyaparatvādabhyāsasya bhedakatve niraste tenaivānupasthitirūpaprakaraṇāntarasya pramātṛbhedenotpattyākṣepakatve 'pi
GSP28jsbh2-4u:160: yato 'dhyetṛbhedena dvayorapyutpattiparatvāt naikatarasyotpattiśiṣṭatvamutpannaśiṣṭatvaṃ vā, ata eva ekatareṇaikatarasya bādhāyogādekārthatve sati vrīhiyavayoriva vikalpa ityarthaḥ kāṭhakādisamākhyānāṃ śākhāsviva karmaṇyapi prayogāt tābhirādhvaryavādisamākhyāvat puruṣaviśeṣaniyamopapattyāśaṅkāmabhipretya pariharati ---------- saceti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:161: karmaṇi prayogasya kaṭhaproktagranthavihitasaṃbandhanimittakasya kartṛtāsaṃbandhena kaṭhādiniyāmakatvāyogāt na tena vyavasthāsiddhirityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:165: śākhāntaravṛttisvānuṣṭheyārthaviṣaye tadvidhisiddhajñānābhāve sati tadupāyākṣepakatvopapatteḥ kalpasūtrādhyayanena tajjñānasaṃbhavenānuṣṭhānopapattyā nirasyati -------- śākhāntarīyeti (kratuvidhīnāṃ śūdrādhikārākṣepakatvanirāsaḥ) śūdrasya tadākṣepasaṃbhave 'pi tadupāyādhyayananiṣedhānna taditi vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:167: śākhāntarīyāṅgopasaṃhāre “bahvalpaṃ vā svagṛhyoktaṃ yasya yāvat prakīrttitaṃ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:168: tasya tāvati śāstrārthe kṛte sarvaḥ kṛto bhave” diti vacanena svagṛhyapadasyopalakṣaṇatayā svagṛhyoktasya svaśākhāvagatasya
GSP28jsbh2-4u:176: virodhābhāvānna balābalānveṣaṇaṃ kāryamityabhipretya tadavaśiṣṭasya vicāraṇīyasyābhāvāt adhyāyārthamupasaṃharati --------- tadevamiti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:179: teṣāmiti bahuvacanena ataḥ paramityanenaca sūcitottarādhyāyārthanirūpaṇaṃ pratyetadadhyāyārthanirūpaṇasya hetuhetumadbhāvarūpā saṅgatiruttaratra spaṣṭībhaviṣyati //
